alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:58AM CDT until April 05 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE AND NORTHERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 658 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Richton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... State Line and Buckatunna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
